Content.Text:
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I just don't know... Is it really okay to ask, out of
the blue? Still...we're a couple! Dates are
normal, right?
<PAGE>
But, how should I ask...?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Augh! I'm sick of this. It'll turn out however it
turns out!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aha. Perfect. <MYNAME>, what do you say we
go and--

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Why, hello there, lovely lady. You are as beautiful
as ever! As gorgeous as a wild flower, blooming
in the field!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have been inviting all the lovely ladies in town
to a humble little tea party later today. Would
you care to join me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sheesh, <MYNAME>. You are way too
approachable. You let all these weirdos walk up
to you and just start blabbing away!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Besides, I was going to ask you out first, but
while I was waffling over what to say, that guy
just waltzed up and asked you point blank...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Er, never mind. Forget I said anything.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, did I surprise you, popping up out of
nowhere?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I-it was just an accident! Th-that's right, I just
happened to be passing by when I saw that guy
come up to you.
Thanks. I'm glad you did.
I wanted some tea...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Uh...no problem.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But you wanted to go, right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The tea party, I mean. You like those kinds of
things, where people sit and chat and snack on
stuff, don't you?
Yeah, I did want to go.
I'd rather be with you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah. I thought so. Sorry for butting in, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You can probably still catch up to him. Go tell
him you'll go to his party. See ya...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Huh?! Wh-what are you saying?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Do you seriously...?! C-c'mon...!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sure you've realized this, but I'm not good at
pretty, flowery speeches like that guy is. Why
would you want to...?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Sheesh, you are an odd one if you'd pick
somebody like me over somebody like him...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...So, uh, <MYNAME>? Do you have some
time?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good. Then hang out with me. We can go get
something to eat.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LOVE>C'mon, I'm trying to ask you on a date, here! You
said you wanted to be with me, right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good. Let's go, then.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, my! It seems I've been kicked by a horse.
Good thing I'm all right!
